__e: Well, he wants us to spend more time together before the baby comes.

I don't think we have many more weeks to wait for this baby.
Well, he wants us to spend more time together before the baby comes.
I don't think we have many more weeks to wait for this baby.
So I say that we just make a list of everything that needs to get done before the baby arrives and do everything on that list tonight!
Mr. Kringelein, I must talk with you before the police come.
Beacon's only 40 miles away from the Mall.
I can't be here when the police come.
The arrival of our new son has been the cause of great joy for our family.
No theory. Just so long as he's not got his nose out of joint over our new member.
We've all heard arrival day stories from our side...
I'm trusting you here alone until your father shows up.
Beacon's only 40 miles away from the Mall.
No, no, I can't eat anything till your father comes home.
Well, we didn't have enough supplies to wait for the rescue, so we had to think of something.
We understand you were with the body when our people arrived?
We should all be looking for ways... we can defend ourselves until help gets here.
She did what she could, I guess. But by the time the cops got here...
The whole idea, baby, is that we get out one minute before the fuzz get here, right?
And if it's without you, well, then, we'll just have to go in and get out... before the cops come.
If we don't do this before the other Cylons come back, we're all dead anyway.
Once you've got what you came for... the trick is just getting out before security shows up.
I want to get behind my desk before anyone else gets in so I don't have to answer any questions.
Now, a baby is something that cannot be stopped.
There is no good moment, of course, for a notorious villain to arrive.
Although it's getting harder and harder to say no with the arrival of a new family member every five minutes.
I was here, working on the intake problem,... ..moments away from a solution, when you attacked me.
It is best used after bathing .... but need something in the morning more ....
